verses.verse: Now in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>assembled<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and earth on <S%H127>them.<s%>

The <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from all <S%H1121>foreigners,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H3034>confessed<s%> their <S%H2403>sins,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

They stood <S%H6965>up<s%> in their <S%H5977>place,<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> a fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> of the <S%H3117>day;<s%> and a fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> they <S%H3034>confessed,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> <S%H1138>Bunni,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> and <S%H3662>Chenani<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> on the <S%H4608>stairs,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> <S%H2813>Hashabneiah,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H1941>Hodiah,<s%> <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> and <S%H6611>Pethahiah,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Stand <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting!<s%> <S%H1288>Bessed<s%> be your <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> above all <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H8416>praise!<s%>

You are <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even you <S%H6213>alone.<s%> You have made <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> with all their <S%H6635>army,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all things that are on <S%H3220>it,<s%> the seas and all that is in <S%H2421>them,<s%> and you preserve them <S%H6635>all.<s%> The army of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> worships <S%H7812>you.<s%>

You are <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and brought him <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> and <S%H7760>gave<s%> him the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%>

and <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3772>you,<s%> and made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and have <S%H6965>performed<s%> your <S%H1697>words;<s%> for you are <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
"You <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%>

and <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and against all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and against all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of his <S%H776>land;<s%> for you <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> against <S%H6213>them,<s%> and made a <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H3117>yourself,<s%> as it is this day.

You <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>them,<s%> so that they went through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the dry <S%H3004>land;<s%> and you <S%H7993>cast<s%> their <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths,<s%> as a <S%H68>stone<s%> into the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

<S%H5982>Moreover,<s%> in a pillar of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> you <S%H5148>led<s%> them by <S%H3119>day;<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to give them <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

"You came <S%H3381>down<s%> also on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

and made <S%H3045>known<s%> to them your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and a <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> your <S%H5650>servant,<s%>

and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> for their <S%H7458>hunger,<s%> and brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for them out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and <S%H559>commanded<s%> them that they should go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which you had <S%H3027>sworn<s%> to give <S%H5414>them.<s%>
"But they and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> and <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck,<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

and <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>obey,<s%> neither were they <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of your <S%H6381>wonders<s%> that you <S%H6213>did<s%> among <S%H7185>them,<s%> but hardened their <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and in their <S%H4805>rebellion<s%> <S%H5414>appointed<s%> a <S%H7218>captain<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H5659>bondage.<s%> But you are a <S%H433>God<s%> ready to <S%H5547>pardon,<s%> <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and <S%H5800>didn't<s%> forsake them.

<S%H6213>Yes,<s%> when they had made them a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'This is your God who brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>' and had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H1419>awful<s%> <S%H5007>blasphemies;<s%>

yet you in your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H5800>didn't<s%> forsake them in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>didn't<s%> depart from over them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> neither the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to show them <S%H215>light,<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

You <S%H5414>gave<s%> also your <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> to <S%H7919>instruct<s%> <S%H4513>them,<s%> and didn't withhold your <S%H4478>manna<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

<S%H705>"Yes,<s%> forty <S%H8141>years<s%> you <S%H3557>sustained<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> They <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H8008>nothing.<s%> Their clothes <S%H1086>didn't<s%> grow old, and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H1216>didn't<s%> swell.

Moreover you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> and <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> which you <S%H2505>allotted<s%> according to their <S%H6285>portions.<s%> So they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> even the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

You also <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> concerning which you <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that they should go <S%H935>in<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

"So the <S%H1121>children<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and you <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> with their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that they might <S%H6213>do<s%> with them as they <S%H7522>pleased.<s%>

They <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and a <S%H8082>rich<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all good <S%H2898>things,<s%> <S%H953>cisterns<s%> <S%H2672>dug<s%> <S%H3754>out,<s%> vineyards, and <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3978>groves,<s%> and fruit <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%> So they <S%H398>ate,<s%> were <S%H7646>filled,<s%> became <S%H8080>fat,<s%> and <S%H5727>delighted<s%> themselves in your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness.<s%>

"Nevertheless they were <S%H4784>disobedient,<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H7993>you,<s%> and cast your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> their <S%H1458>back,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them to <S%H7725>turn<s%> them again to <S%H6213>you,<s%> and they committed <S%H1419>awful<s%> <S%H5007>blasphemies.<s%>

Therefore you <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> who <S%H6887>distressed<s%> <S%H6256>them.<s%> In the time of their <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H8085>you,<s%> you heard from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and according to your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3467>saviors<s%> who <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>

But after they had <S%H5117>rest,<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5800>you;<s%> therefore left you them in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> so that they had the <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over <S%H7725>them;<s%> yet when they returned, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H8085>you,<s%> you heard from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> you <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them according to your <S%H7356>mercies,<s%>

and <S%H5749>testified<s%> against <S%H7725>them,<s%> that you might bring them again to your <S%H8451>law.<s%> Yet they dealt <S%H2102>proudly,<s%> and <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> but <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against your <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> (which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in <S%H5414>them<s%>), turned their <S%H3802>backs,<s%> <S%H7185>stiffened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and would not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you put up with <S%H5749>them,<s%> and testified against them by your <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> Yet would they not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H238>ear.<s%> Therefore you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands.<s%>

"Nevertheless in your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> you <S%H6213>did<s%> not make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H5800>them,<s%> nor forsake <S%H2587>them;<s%> for you are a gracious and <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

Now <S%H430>therefore,<s%> our God, the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and the <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H8513>don't<s%> let all the travail seem <S%H4591>little<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4672>you,<s%> that has come on <S%H4428>us,<s%> on our kings, on our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and on our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and on our <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and on our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and on all your <S%H5971>people,<s%> since the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
However you are <S%H6662>just<s%> in all that has <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H6213>us;<s%> for you have dealt <S%H6213>truly,<s%> but we have done <S%H7561>wickedly;<s%>

neither have our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> nor our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> your <S%H8451>law,<s%> nor <S%H7181>listened<s%> to your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and your <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> with which you testified against <S%H5749>them.<s%>

For they have not <S%H5647>served<s%> you in their <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and in your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> that you <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H7342>them,<s%> and in the large and <S%H8082>rich<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> neither did they turn from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H4611>works.<s%>

<S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> we are servants this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and as for the <S%H776>land<s%> that you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> and its <S%H2898>good,<s%> <S%H5650>behold,<s%> we are servants in it.

It yields <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> whom you have <S%H5414>set<s%> over us because of our <S%H2403>sins:<s%> also they have <S%H4910>power<s%> over our <S%H1472>bodies,<s%> and over our <S%H929>livestock,<s%> at their <S%H7522>pleasure,<s%> and we are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

Yet for all <S%H3772>this,<s%> we make a <S%H548>sure<s%> <S%H3789>covenant,<s%> and write <S%H8269>it;<s%> and our princes, our <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> seal <S%H2856>it.<s%>"
